titles.title: Referring the bill (H.R. ), entitled "A bill for the relief of Sarabeth M. Davis, Robert S. Borders, Victor Maron, Irving Berke, and Adele E. Conrad", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 10/17/2000--Introduced. Refers H.R. 5481 (private relief) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report.
